title: Star Guardian Skins
body: When are the star guardian skins coming out?

replies.body: The actual Star Guardian "event" doesn't start until 9/7 according to the [**patch notes**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-717-notes). It's pretty likely the skins won't hit the shop until the event officially begins.
Uhhhh.....why is the event starting on 9/7? That's just the date they chose tbh, everythings gotta start sometime!

IKR !!!
i purchase RP quickly so i can buy it when the patch released but ........{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OAYEv0BQ,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-08-24T04:34:44.162+0000)
>
> Uhhhh.....why is the event starting on 9/7? That's just the date they chose tbh, everythings gotta start sometime!

Do you have an estimation at how much the bundle will cost?
Gives people time to buy Ornn and then save up money again to buy some SG skins.
